content:
The R4 VitalSigns profile defines name="Vital Signs Profile" (incl. whitespace)
http://build.fhir.org/vitalsigns.profile.xml.html
However according to the definition of StructureDefinition.name, the element value should be "computer-friendly":
http://build.fhir.org/structuredefinition-definitions.html#StructureDefinition.name
@Grahame Grieve are we spitting out the validation warnings anywhere?
yes but that particular warning is mostly being ignored
my bad for missing this. is there still time to do a pr?
